Accommodations

The main conference venue is UCLA Meyer and Renee Luskin Conference Center. However, there are many other options for accommodation, including the Hotel Angeleno and AirBnB, available within walking distance, via hotel shuttle, or using public transportation.

Below is a list of conference hotels:

UCLA Meyer and Renee Luskin Conference Center

425 Westwood Plaza, Los Angeles, CA 90095, USA
Hotel Website

Distance to venue: Conference hotel
Cut-off date: July 20, 2017
Reservation: Group Code: ACM082017
Reservations by phone: +1 (855) LCC-UCLA / +1 (855) 522-8252
Amenities:
  • Free WiFi
Rates: $240 plus tax single
$240 plus tax double
35$/day charge for each additional person beyond double occupancy

All reservations must be guaranteed with a major credit card and accompanied by a first night room deposit.

Guests may cancel reservations without any penalty and with a full refund if canceled by 4pm up to 72 hours prior to arrival date. If canceled any time after 4pm, 72 hours prior to arrival and up to arrival date, a fee of one night’s room rate will be assessed. No-shows will also be charged one night’s room rate.

   Online Reservation

Hotel Angeleno

170 N Church Ln, Los Angeles, CA 90049
Hotel Website

Distance to venue: 2 miles
Rating:
Cut-off date: July 31, 2017
Reservation: Group code: "SIGCOMM Conference 2017"
Reservations by phone: +1 (310) 476-6411
Amenities:
  • Free WiFi
  • Free parking
  • Free shuttle within 3-mile radius
Rates: $199 plus tax single
$199 plus tax double

All reservations must be guaranteed by a valid credit card at the time of reservation.

Cancellation 24 hours prior to arrival.

Guests can book online or call the Reservations Line at (866) 264-3536 to book their reservations, please make sure to reference the “SIGCOMM Conference 2017” room block in order to receive the special discounted rate.

Contact Kristie Cardenas if you require additional assistance

   Online Reservation

Note that the conference will provide breakfast and lunch.
